meanings.definition: Extremely thin or skinny in a way that is unattractive or unhealthy.
meanings.sent1: The scrawniest cat in the neighborhood always struggles to catch mice.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about being the scrawniest person in her class.
meanings.sent3: The scrawniest tree in the forest looked like it needed a good meal.
meanings.sent4: His scrawniest efforts at the gym were no match for his friend's dedication.
meanings.sent5: The scrawniest branches of the tree barely held any leaves, looking fragile and delicate.

meanings.definition: The least impressive or significant in a group.
meanings.sent1: Among the flowers, the scrawniest one seemed to wilt the fastest.
meanings.sent2: He was always picked last for the team, being the scrawniest of them all.
meanings.sent3: The scrawniest pencil in the box was always the first to get lost.
meanings.sent4: In the lineup of superheroes, he was considered the scrawniest sidekick.
meanings.sent5: The scrawniest member of the band played the triangle, often overlooked but essential to the music.
